summary: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.
cast: Mark Harmon|Kirstie Alley|Robin Thomas|Patrick Labyorteaux|Courtney Thorne-Smith|Dean Cameron|Gary Riley|Kelly Jo Minter|Ken Olandt|Shawnee Smith|Richard Steven Horvitz|Fabiana Udenio|Francis X. title: Juerga tropical
